Name: Shamrock Express
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Review: Creamy coffee with the sweetness of butterscotch.
History: Created in 1999 by Greg Pearson at Mystique, Manchester, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Shamrock Express contains 251 calories
